author: David Stosik

changelog.release_notes:
- Now built with Pebble SDK 3.6, not a beta release, app runs on watch.
- Added Pebble Time Round support.
Fix a bug on Pebble Time version that broke the background color (it was white all the time).

- Add gray shades to Aplite version of the watch face. - Use bold font for color names (may wrap).
- Recompile with SDK 2.9 (was 2.8.1).
Retrofit a version compatible with the Aplite platform (1st-generation Pebbles).

description:
The Pebble Time version is now available in the store! You don't need to get it from the source link anymore.

Now compatible with 1-st generation Pebble watches and the latest Pebble Time Round!
This means you can install a downgraded version of this watch face on your original Pebble and Pebble Steel.

Get a new background color every minute of an hour!

Pebble Time's color palette is exactly 60 colors + 4 shades from white to black.
This watch face will use a different color on every minute of an hour.
It also displays the color's name in Pebble's Palette.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Now built with Pebble SDK 3.6, not a beta release, app runs on watch.
- Added Pebble Time Round support.

title: 60 Shades of Time
